entry.title: 0.3 Beta API
entry.content:
0.3 beta API around the corner

Well, our new 0.3 beta API is just about ready for release. We’re working on the documentation now. In a few weeks it’ll be ready, which means we’ll be kicking off our open source projects — hopefully — before the end of the month!

We’ll start with our Java SDK, and then it’s onto the Android client.

Keep an eye out for upcoming meetups.

Privacy-enhanced social network, here we come!
